page.title: 20DOMESDAY CLASS OF '85
page.content: We have enjoyed our year in 3MA. Mr Anderson is our teacher he is alright we suppose.Some of the work that we do is Maths,English.The kind of Maths that we do is called S.M.P.Our class have all had our ups and downs but we've managed to get through it.Our names are Karen Chandler and Kika Holt and we are aged 11 our best friend is Emily Hill.Everyone finds it easy to get on with Mr Anderson because he's so understanding.Sometimes he has his moods but apart from that he's a nice teacher.We all like Drama thats the time when we get to know each other.The games that we play are Cat and Mouse, that's what we all enjoy most.The other two third year teachers are Mrs Steel and Mr Roe.All the children in the third year get on with each other.
